imageAlt: People kneeled down and bent over on a yoga mat with their arms forward
courseBrief: Ashtanga Vinyasa Yoga is perfect for the dynamic rider who strives to build strength and increase flexibility. This class teaches an energetic practice, synchronising breath with movements.

imageAlt: Woman with arms above her head in a yoga position while sitting on a dark brown horse
courseBrief: Horseback Yoga is an excellent class for the more experienced rider, combining seat training with traditional yoga practices. This class will deepen the bond between you and the horse, improving both trust and communication between horse and rider.

imageAlt: People sitting in a yoga position on yoga mats with their arms resting on their knees
courseBrief: Hatha Yoga is a holistic practice that seeks to improve flexibility, strength, and inner peace through the harmonization of breath and movement.

imageAlt: Sweaty woman with sports wear standing in a yoga position
courseBrief: Hot Yoga is a style of yoga performed in a heated room, typically around 95-105°F (35-40°C). This intense heat is intended to enhance flexibility and detoxification while challenging practitioners through a series of yoga postures.

imageAlt: Girl sitting on a white horse and a woman holds the horse
courseBrief: Seat Training with Maria Lind, this fall seat trainer Maria Lind is hosting a new course here at Saddle Up Yoga Studio. Take this opportunity to work on you balance and sharpen your riding skills.

imageAlt: Blonde woman standing with brown horse
courseBrief: Mindfulness. In this class we are reducing stress, improving mental clarity, and fostering a greater sense of self-awareness and emotional well-being.
